Text:
Before I download 95 fuckin' gigs... what are the audio/video specs?  Is this even 720p?  I never heard of "good" quality video.  SD, HD, 720p, 1080p, sure... but not "Good".

Is this a VHS rip?
@afkuser - I don't know what a good quality video is either but I'm going to find out by downloading one episode and finding out - I suggest you do the same!!!
I've been trying for several days to download some of this to see about it.  As of yet none of it has been downloaded because there appear to be no seeders.
